title: HearthCrawler R30 Cracked
description:
Latest HearthCrawler R30 cracked by 0x22

1. Unzip the folder to your desired location.

2. Run Hearthcrawler.exe

3. Just ENTER a blank licence key when asked for "Key required"

Note: You might have to close down HearthStone before you launch HearthCrawler.

Note: Make sure to open the port in the firewall requested by the Agent

Credits to 0x22 for all the patch work :)
